.. class:: infomark
================================================================================ **Rnmr1D**: Processing nmrML or verndor NMR data ================================================================================
----------- Description -----------
Rnmr1D is the main module from the NMRProcFlow web application (http://nmrprocflow.org) develpped by Daniel Jacob (INRA), for 1D NMR spectra data processing. Rnmr1D allows users to process their NMR spectra using set of macro-command sequence. Outside NMRProcFlow Rnmr1D become a CLI application allowing users to replay the macro-command sequence generated within NMRProcFlow. Moreover, without using NMRProcFlow, this module can also be used to replace any 'home-made script' by a macro-command sequence. See Parameters for details.
.. class:: infomark
**References**
| Jacob D, Deborde C, Lefebvre M, Maucourt M, Moing A. NMRProcFlow: a graphical and interactive tool dedicated to 1D spectra processing for NMR-based metabolomics. Metabolomics. 2017;13(4):36. doi:10.1007/s11306-017-1178-y.
---------------------------------------------------
----------------- Workflow position -----------------
Right after the nmrMLConv in a workflow or Galaxy nmrML/Vedor RAW NMR data
.. image:: rnmr1d.png :height: 425 :width: 392
----------- Input files -----------
Galaxy dataset nmrML or Vendor file format. Data input could be Zipped (preferred) or as individual files
---------- Parameters ---------- Use the macro editor for parameters, you need the have the correct Macro parameters as input for data processing (updated coming soon, currently as input .txt script file)
------------ Output files ------------
Output: | NMR data matrix with aligned values (CSV format) | Bucket file | Spectra file
